alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Jackson; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 11:32PM MDT until July 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAAKON...EAST CENTRAL MEADE...NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1131 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Creighton to 2 miles southwest of Grindstone to 4 miles west of Philip, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Philip around 1135 PM MDT. Grindstone Butte around 1145 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Billsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
